"S-Class Special Abilities":
"\"S-Class special abilities\" have stronger effects than most other special abilities.

[Example]
・S2: Immediate Profusion
Raises damage by 3% when Just Attacking different PAs or Techniques.

・S3: Flowing Exhilaration
Recover HP by 40% at regular intervals.

\"S-Class special abilities\" can only be used with weapons that support them."

"In addition to requiring weapons that support them, \"S-Class special abilities\" come in compatibility groups, such as S1 and S2.

\"S-Class special abilities\" cannot be affixed to a weapon if their groups are incompatible.

※\"S-Class special abilities\" affixing success chance does not decrease when using the extra slot."
